description:
For quick stops and low-risk trips, this pair gives you double-duty protection for your frame and wheels.

  • New double deadbolt design helps prevent twist or one cut attempts
  • Includes two replacement stainless-steel keys covered under Kryptonite’s optional Key Safe Program for stress-free key replacements
  • Includes a quick click style bracket to easily mount your lock to your bike
  • Comes with a 4ft. long flex cable so you can protect your wheels
name: Kryptonite Keeper 12 U-Lock w/Flex Cable
